reviews.text:
This is now at the gaming cafe in the campus gateway; or maybe they also still have the ghost kitchen on Essex?  

Anyway, we came to play games, and got...
Really delicious food. We catered TaKorea for lunch and it was excellent. Highly recommend the birria tacos and KFC!
I've tried about 50 restaurants in Columbus so far and I'm still amazed by all the hidden gems I find/hear about. I'm already a huge Korean cuisine fan but...
